NK040(thi)016:1: // khros ma 'bum bskul dang lha 'dre 'bum bskul bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)016:2: dbus phyogs sangs rgyas rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)016:5: ma 'dir gshegs brgyan gyi mchod pa 'bul //
NK040(thi)016:6: snang srid lha 'dres bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)016:7: snang srid lha 'dres bzhes nas kyang //
NK040(thi)016:8: 'dod yon lnga yi tshim gyur cig /
NK040(thi)016:9: 'dod yon lnga yi tshim nas kyang //
NK040(thi)016:10: bsngosa pa bzhin du tshim gyur cig /
NK040(thi)016:11: bsngosa pa bzhin du tshim nas kyang //
NK040(thi)016:12: bsam pa bzhin du 'grub gyur cig /
NK040(thi)016:13: tshe rabs 'khor ba thog med kyi //
NK040(thi)016:14: bu lon lan chags byang gyur cig /
NK040(thi)016:15: bu lon lan chags byang nas kyang //
NK040(thi)016:16: sha mkhon sdig sgrib dag gyur cig /
NK040(thi)016:17: sha 'khon sdig sgrib dag nas kyang //
NK040(thi)016:18: thams cad mchog gi dngos grub thob par shog /
NK040(thi)016:19: ma shar rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)016:22: ma 'dir gshegs brgyan gyi mchod pa 'bul //
NK040(thi)016:23: snang srid lha 'dres bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)016:24: snang srid lha 'dres bzhes nas kyang //
NK040(thi)016:25: 'dod yon lnga yi tshim gyur cig /
NK040(thi)016:26: 'dod yon lnga yi tshim nas kyang //
NK040(thi)016:27: bsngosa pa bzhin du tshim gyur cig /
NK040(thi)016:28: bsngosa pa bzhin du tshim nas kyang //
NK040(thi)016:29: bsam pa bzhin du 'grub gyur cig /
NK040(thi)016:30: tshe rabs 'khor ba thog med kyi //
NK040(thi)016:31: bu lon lan chags byang gyur cig /
NK040(thi)016:32: bu lon lan chags byang nas kyang //
NK040(thi)016:33: sha 'khon sdig sgrib dag gyur cig /
NK040(thi)016:34: sha mkhon sdig sgrib dag nas kyang //
NK040(thi)016:35: thams cad mchog gi dngos grub thob par shog /
NK040(thi)016:36: ma lho rin chen rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)016:38: ma nub pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' mkha' 'gro sogs /
NK040(thi)016:39: ma byang las kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bye sogs /
NK040(thi)016:40: ma steng mkha' spyod rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)016:42: ma 'og sa spyod rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)016:44: ma mtshams 'jig rten rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)016:46: sa 'og sa steng sa bla yi //
NK040(thi)016:48: 'dod yon lnga yi mchod pa rnams //
NK040(thi)016:49: bsngosa pa bzhin du tshim gyur cig /
NK040(thi)016:51: thams cad mchog gi dngos grub thob par shog /
NK040(thi)016:52: phatahphatahphatah brjod la lhod de 'bol le shig ge sems ma bcos pa'i ngang nas ma yeng par zhog /
